SEARCH
Package game.body.items

Class HealthPotion

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.StaticBody
game.body.items.ItemFrame
game.body.items.HealthPotion
public final class HealthPotion extends ItemFrame
HealthVial class is a subclass of the ItemBody class. This class is used to create a health vial item that can be picked up by the player to increase their health points.
Since:
06-03-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk
